channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING IN THE LOADSIDE AREA. UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA FOR PROCESSING. DescribePack: ALL BOTTLES INSIDE PACKAGE WERE LEAKING DUE TO LOOSE CAPS. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE WAS PLACED INTO PLASTIC BAG TO PREVENT FURTHER LEAKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023070867
item.description:
Report X-2023070867

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-08T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023070867 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING/WET IN THE LOADSIDE AREA. ALL 4 BOTTLES BEGAN TO LEAK DUE TO LOOSE CAPS. UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA. DescribePack: BOTTLE CAPS BECAME LOOSE DURING HANDLING. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE PLACED INTO A PLASTIC BAG AND TAKENTO THE HAZMAT AREA FOR PROCESSING. 2. X-2023070869 SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DISCOVERED LEAKING/WET IN THE LOADSIDE AREA. UPON INSPECTION, ALL 4 BOTTLES WERE LEAKING DUE TO LOOSE CAPS. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA FOR PROCESSING. DescribePack: BOTTLES CAPS BECAME LOOSE DURING HANDLING. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE PLACED INTO PLASTIC BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT PROCESSING AREA.
